en: gracious wishes of the new spring
long life of 100 years (used by children for elders)
may myriad things go according to your will
may money flow in like water

vn: Năm mới thăng quan tiến chức
en: I wish that you will get promoted in the new year

vn: Năm mới toàn gia bình an
en: I wish that the new year will bring health to all your family
